item.description:
TIGER LILY IS THE BAND AND THEY ARE AWESOME! Let's spend this New Years together and at the same time be close to home......Join us at PINZ in Milford. Reservations are made for 7 pm.........we'll have dinner (SEATING AT 7 PM)! Everyone pays their own. More details to follow.............We'll ring out 2009 and Welcome 2010! Kindly RSVP soon so a 'count' can be given to the establishment and they know how many of us 'party'ers are coming!

STAY OVERNIGHT
For those of you coming a distance and prefer not to drive home La Quinta Inn Milford is offering the meetup group a room rate of $59. Less than 4 miles away from PINZ. When you make your reservation tell them you are with the "meetup" group. Reservations: 508-478-8243 To save money, post a note in the comments section looking for a roommate.
item.how_to_find_us: We have reserved tables FOR THIRTY PEOPLE FOR DINNER in the Blue Dog Lounge located at PINZ..Please pay for your dinner & drinks by CASH.
item.name: New Years Event Planned!
